rows.name: Lucid Interval
rows.description: You have a period of blissful calm. Any Conditions you have previously gained from your Delirium are removed.

rows.name: Fitful Sleep
rows.description: You toss and turn, asleep but not resting. Gain 1 Unconscious for the next hour, and 1 Fatigued Condition for the next 1d10 hours.

rows.name: Confusion
rows.description: Plagued by weird, distorted visions, you gain one Stunned Condition for the next hour

rows.name: Hallucinations
rows.description: You see strange and terrifying visions, and must make a Test against Terror 3 every 10 minutes for the next hour. You also gain +1 Stunned Condition for the next 1d10 hours
